Castro is a beautiful, full-featured podcast player that makes it easy to track and manage lots of podcasts at the same time. Only listen to the episodes you want and easily skip the rest, queue up hours of podcasts at a time and enjoy a seamless listening experience with carplay compatibility, chapter support, trim silence and much, much more!

HOW IT WORKS

1. New episodes land in the NEW tab. Read their descriptions, add episodes you like to your QUEUE, and clear the rest. 

2. Press play to listen to episodes from your QUEUE in order. Queued episodes are downloaded automatically.

3. Re-order your QUEUE to plan your next few hours of listening at any time. Browse your LIBRARY to review the back catalogue, quickly access starred shows, and see your listening history.

Subscribing to a podcast is no longer a commitment to listen to every episode. You don’t have to manage a huge list of subscriptions or choose a few shows and miss the rest.


WHY OUR USERS LOVE CASTRO

• Drag and drop podcasts to plan your listening with Castro’s unique queue
• An elegant dark mode and thoughtfully designed sleep timer offer the best in night time podcast listening.
• CarPlay support makes it easy to pick up where you left off while driving.
• Apple Watch app to control playback and select another episode from your queue.
• Episode notifications include a summary of the episode to help you decide if it interests you. Play, queue or clear the episode directly from the notification without opening the app.


CASTRO PLUS

Castro Plus is an optional paid subscription available for $18.99/year (includes a one-week trial). Plus unlocks a range of advanced features:

• Trim Silence — With this option on, the app will analyze audio as it plays to detect silent parts and accelerate those parts. Get through more episodes faster.
• Enhance Voices improves the listening experience for many podcasts and makes it easier to hear in loud environments. Under the hood, Enhance Voices applies a dynamic compressor to increase volume just where it’s needed.
• Sideloading: Import audio files directly, just by dropping them in iCloud Drive
• Mono-Mix — Mixes a stereo podcast to mono, which makes it easier to hear podcasts that pan some guests on left/right channels. 
• Chapter Support: Artwork, Skipping & Pre-selection. 
• Custom settings per-podcast: Episode Limit, Trim Silence, Enhance Voices, Mono Mix, Skip Intros, Playback Speed.


WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING

— The Sweet Setup

“Castro 3 is everything Castro already was, but better.”
— MacStories

Castro 3 Is a Great Modern Podcast App”
— Beautiful Pixels

“Unlike other podcatchers, Castro's primary virtue is its simplicity and ease of use. The app combines sleek visual design with crystal clear audio.”

CASTRO PLUS SUBSCRIPTION TERMS

Cyware Social app has been designed to keep security professionals and general users up-to-date on the security threat landscape. Cyware Social brings to you the latest security articles written by Cyware’s team of experts as well as top security updates from third-party sources. These articles are categorized into appropriate categories for easy accessibility. 

Communication and Information Sharing are integral parts of security culture and critical components for employees to become active in any organization’s security efforts. Cyware offers several niche features that have never been offered in a mobile app.
 
SMART STORIES: Cyware presents to you only the best from the tens of thousands of Cyber stories published daily. These stories cover the entire spectrum of cybersecurity news and leave you with enriched security awareness.

CYBER EVENTS: Striving to provide accurate cyber awareness, we curate a list of cyber events being held across the world, to bring to you the most popular and upcoming cybersecurity conferences, symposia, talks and training courses via our free mobile app.

NEWSLETTERS: We have made it simple and easy for users to start receiving smart newsletters that will have everything they want in one place. Subscribe to stay ahead of ever-evolving cyber threats.
 
HACKER NEWS FEEDS: If you take your security with utmost seriousness, then Cyware’s hacker news would be your first and last stop. Cyware’s hacker news is tailored to arm its users with the real and valuable cybersecurity news with numerous updates on the latest attacks, breaches, application security, cybersecurity compliances, and privacy policies. This equips users to significantly improve the ability to tackle cyber threats. Cyware ensures that you do not miss out on the latest cyber hacking news and always remain a step ahead of the threat actors.
 
PERSONALIZED FEEDS: You’re in control. As we adopt to your insights, we’ll help you find more news feeds that you need — and allow you to filter out the rest.
 
SMART VIEW: Read from the source URL much faster and with more ease by recasting the relevant content for quick and smart consumption. 

EASY ACCESSIBILITY: Quickly switch between alert categories from quickly accessible segments on the header and easily scroll through updates from Cyware Hacker News and Open Source Alerts. 

SPEED READ: Swiftly read through the important cyber alerts as and when they arrive thus inculcating real-time situational awareness.

CUSTOMIZABLE FEED INTERFACE: Customize the appearance of the alerts in the apps user interface by choosing a preferred viewing option from the settings. The default Standard View is Comfortable and has the most white space between various interface elements.

LANDING PAGE PREFERENCE: You can choose to open a preferred page when your app opens first and quickly get insights into the most relevant and latest alerts from your categories.

CYBER ONLY: We retain the essential facts on the most important need-to-know Cybersecurity matters while providing access to the original news source using a dedicated Open Source Alerts section.

SITUATIONAL AWARENESS: You will stay informed with happenings in your network and quickly share important Alerts with your trusted partners.

SMART CONSUMPTION:Cyware provides expertly curated news divided into many categories for smart and quick consumption by the user. User can customize the feeds by selecting preferred categories in his/her account. 

Be it the latest cybersecurity news trends, innovations, tools, strategies or opinions, we bring to you the most up-to-date and relevant news articles. We help you stay informed about major breaches and incidents, new malware and vulnerabilities, threat intelligence, cyber analysis, and laws regulations thereby helping you gain security awareness.

Download the Cointelegraph app to get dialed into crypto news, interviews, videos, and more from the Cointelegraph website — all packaged into the convenience of the crypto app. Crypto trades 24/7, leading to constant industry news, Bitcoin trading, crypto developments, and more. Explore data on coin prices, follow NFT news and updates, get the scoop on decentralized finance, watch crypto market videos, and more — all at the touch of a finger. What’s included in the Cointelegraph app:
